episode36.name: 35  SEC Tournament Review, Big Dance Preview, Arkansas Rivalry Talk
episode36.description: This week's episode may as well be called Hoop City. The crew touches  on Arkansas' three games at the SEC Tournament, as well as previewing  the Hogs' first NCAA Tournament game since 2008. In addition, they  want to know whether the Arkansas-LSU football rivalry is more  superior than the Arkansas-Kentucky hoops rivalry.
